## RoseParams.unitString property

Gauge lower string title - default: `""`

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
unitString?: string;
```

## Remarks

if [useOdometer](./steelseries-rose-gauge.roseparams.useodometer.md) = `true`<!-- -->, it works as odometer title)
